Antonio Arjona

Petrohead with a keen interest in classic cars and automotive art

Background

As a car enthusiast, I have strived to combine my passion for automotive with my paintings. This desire has resulted in these pieces of automotive art. Over the years, cars have become one of my favourite subjects to paint. Every type of car has its own set of personality traits, which I try to bring out by painting them in portrait style.


Iaaaaa. Feel free to write me on Twitter.

Artistic Style

Automotive art with acrylic paintings, style, techniques, mediums, .

Commisions

It has been my pleasure to create custom pieces for friends around the world, and I would love to support you to create something unique and special for your space. Time for completion will be worked out beforehand, desired size and color of subjects. All works will be shipped unframed. Acrylic paint is used in all of my works.

Exhibitions

Preparing. Big dreams exhibiting my paintings
